extendedInfo.description: Have you ever tried to assemble Russian dolls (matryoshka)? Now you can do it with your mobile phone. An addictive casual game was completely âhand-madeâ in Russia with true cultural and design inspiration. Unique gameplay and classic Russian style design will give you a lot of fun. You have one minute to assemble as many dolls as possible. Solid color dolls give greater awards. Each assembled doll is removed from scene to cabinet and adds score. The game has two modes: Blitz mode (one minute play) and Relaxed mode (unlimited time play). Your goal in Blitz mode is to obtain maximum score during 1 minute play and beat high score. The goal in Relaxed mode is to unlock all magic dolls and bonuses. The game uses shake sensor to clear scene and proximity sensor to select moving direction of the new doll parts.If you like this game, please write some words about it (in review) and add some stars.PERMISSIONS: Application does not require any permissions. Application is absolutely free from spam, advertisement, viruses, etc.SCREEN RESOLUTIONS: Application designed for resolution 800 * 480. On other screen resolutions some visual glitches may present.

reviews.title: Thanks vadislav!!
reviews.comment: Was having no luck on my daily game hunt. Nothing i lookt at held my attention. But this game did. Im not particularly into russian dolls, but even so, i played it straight thru beginning 2 end. Great idea. Excellent little time filler. Thanx 4 the cool game!!
reviews.author: Justine Penny

reviews.title: Not respond properly
reviews.comment: Games is nice, but doesnt respond properly will try to move a piece up and will go  to the side instead or vice versa
reviews.author: Natalia Varela

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Fun, entertaining, creative, and unlike the many bloatware apps that are out there, it is a reasonable file size.  A bit monotonous after a while, but overall, worth the download.
reviews.author: crystal albright

reviews.title: Nice classic game!
reviews.comment: And yes it\'s kinda addictive, BUT the sound and music are annoying. Seriously. Couldn\'t you just change maybe? Pfffttt
reviews.author: Felicia Lamongi

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I am really enjoying this game.  It is seemingly easy, but it is very challenging.
reviews.author: Annette McIntyre

reviews.title: Excellent timekiller
reviews.comment: Played all weekend on HTC Desire HD2. Works smoothly. Would recommend to everybody as a nice casual game. Definitely miss online record table for blitz mode. Hopefully developer will add it in future updates.
reviews.author: A Google User
